sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal";
import Container from "react-bootstrap/Container";
import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row";
import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col";
import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button";
import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form";

export default function ModalProfile(props) {
  return (
    <>
      <Modal
        {...props}
        size="lg"
        aria-labelledby="contained-modal-title-vcenter"
        centered
      >
        <Modal.Header closeButton>
          <Modal.Title id="contained-modal-title-vcenter">
            Update your profile details
          </Modal.Title>
        </Modal.Header>
        <Modal.Body>
          <Form>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Profile pic</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="file" placeholder="insert image" />
            </Form.Group>

            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Cover pic</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="file" placeholder="insert image" />
            </Form.Group>

            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Email Address</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="email" placeholder="email" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Phone no</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="phone" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Education</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="education" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>City</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="city" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Town</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="text" placeholder="town" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group className="mb-3">
              <Form.Label>Town</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="radio" placeholder="town" />
            </Form.Group>

            <Button variant="primary" type="submit">
              Submit
            </Button>
          </Form>
        </Modal.Body>
        <Modal.Footer>
          <Container>
            <Row>
              <Col md={4}></Col>
              <Col md={{ span: 4, offset: 4 }}>
                <Button onClick={props.onHide} style={{ float: "right" }}>
                  Close
                </Button>
              </Col>
            </Row>
          </Container>
        </Modal.Footer>
      </Modal>
    </>
  );
}
